verses.verse: God <WH430> is our refuge <WH4268> and strength, <WH5797> a very <WH3966> present <WH4672> help <WH5833> in trouble. <WH6869>
Therefore we won't <WH3372> be afraid, though the earth <WH776> changes, <WH4171> though the mountains <WH2022> are shaken <WH4131> into the heart <WH3820> of the seas; <WH3220>
though its waters <WH4325> roar <WH1993> and are troubled, <WH2560> though the mountains <WH2022> tremble <WH7493> with their swelling. <WH1346> Selah. <WH5542>
There is a river, <WH5104> the streams <WH6388> of which make the city <WH5892> of God <WH430> glad, <WH8055> the holy <WH6918> place of the tents <WH4908> of the Most High. <WH5945>
God <WH430> is in her midst. <WH7130> She shall not be moved. <WH4131> God <WH430> will help <WH5826> her at <WH6437> dawn. <WH1242>
The nations <WH1471> raged. <WH1993> The kingdoms <WH4467> were moved. <WH4131> He lifted <WH5414> his voice, <WH6963> and the earth <WH776> melted. <WH4127>
Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> is with us. <WH430> The God of Jacob <WH3290> is our refuge. <WH4869> Selah. <WH5542>
Come, <WH3212> see <WH2372> Yahweh <WH3068>'s works, <WH4659> what desolations <WH8047> he has made <WH7760> in the earth. <WH776>

He makes wars <WH4421> cease <WH7673> to the end <WH7097> of the earth. <WH776> He breaks <WH7665> the bow, <WH7198> and shatters <WH7112> the spear. <WH2595> <WH7112> He burns <WH8313> the chariots <WH5699> in the fire. <WH784>
"Be still, <WH7503> and know <WH3045> that I am God. <WH430> I will be exalted <WH7311> among the nations. <WH1471> I will be exalted <WH7311> in the earth. <WH776>"
Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> is with us. <WH430> The God of Jacob <WH3290> is our refuge. <WH4869> Selah.
